attributes.action: Bring in Legislation to stop the growing trend of wheel clampers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The signs warning people that there is wheel clamping here must be more visible,also there has to be a maximum fine including towing and storage.At the moment,it is just a licence to print money by these parasites.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
